trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2019-1 | Pteramander | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying {7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2019-2 | Experimental Frenzy | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. You can't play lands or cast spells from your hand. {3}{R}: Destroy Experimental Frenzy.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2019-2 | Experimental Frenzy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: コーヒーは発明の偏屈な叔母であるのだ。

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2019-3 | Vraska, Golgari Queen | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+2]: You may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, you gain 1 life and draw a card. [−3]: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less. [−9]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2020-1 | Narset, Parter of Veils | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn. [−2]: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2020-2 | Nissa, Who Shakes the World | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you tap a Forest for mana, add an additional {G}. [+1]: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target noncreature land you control. Untap it. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste that's still a land. [−8]: You get an emblem with "Lands you control have indestructible." Search your library for any number of Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2020-3 | Liliana, Dreadhorde General | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card. [+1]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. [−4]: Each player sacrifices two creatures. [−9]: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2020-4 | Mystical Dispute | Card Text
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue spell. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2020-4 | Mystical Dispute | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「哀れな迷える魔道士よ。足は地についていても、手は届かない。そうだろう？」

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2020-5 | Fae of Wishes | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying {1}{U}, Discard two cards: Return Fae of Wishes to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2020-5 | Granted | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may reveal a noncreature card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2020-6 | Elspeth, Sun's Nemesis | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [−1]: Up to two target creatures you control each get +2/+1 until end of turn. [−2]: Create two 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens. [−3]: You gain 5 life. Escape—{4}{W}{W}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2021-1 | Basri Ket | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn. [−2]: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures attack this turn, create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. [−6]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control."

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2021-2 | Seasoned Hallowblade | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Discard a card: Tap Seasoned Hallowblade. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2021-3 | Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life. {3}{B}{B}: Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2021-4 | Saw It Coming | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2021-5 | Kaya the Inexorable | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Put a ghostform counter on up to one target nontoken creature. It gains "When this creature dies or is put into exile, return it to its owner's hand and create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying." [−3]: Exile target nonland permanent. [−7]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may cast a legendary spell from your hand, from your graveyard, or from among cards you own in exile without paying its mana cost."

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2021-6 | Faceless Haven | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. {S}{S}{S}: Faceless Haven becomes a 4/3 creature with vigilance and all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2022-1 | Grand Master of Flowers | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As long as Grand Master of Flowers has seven or more loyalty counters on him, he's a 7/7 Dragon God creature with flying and indestructible. [+1]: Target creature without first strike, double strike, or vigilance can't attack or block until your next turn. [+1]: Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Monk of the Open Hand, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2022-2 | Adult Gold Dragon | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink, haste

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2022-3 | Krydle of Baldur's Gate | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Krydle of Baldur's Gate deals combat damage to a player, that player loses 1 life and mills a card, then you gain 1 life and scry 1. Whenever you attack, you may pay {2}. If you do, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2022-4 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash As long as The Wandering Emperor entered the battlefield this turn, you may activate her loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant. [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains first strike until end of turn. [−1]: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance. [−2]: Exile target tapped creature. You gain 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2022-5 | Farewell | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose one or more — • Exile all artifacts. • Exile all creatures. • Exile all enchantments. • Exile all graveyards.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2022-6 | Banishing Slash | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy up to one target artifact, enchantment, or tapped creature. Then if you control an artifact and an enchantment, create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2023-1 | Elspeth Resplendent | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Choose up to one target creature. Put a +1/+1 counter and a counter from among flying, first strike, lifelink, or vigilance on it. [−3]: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield with a shield counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. [−7]: Create five 3/3 white Angel creature tokens with flying.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2023-2 | Giada, Font of Hope | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance Each other Angel you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it for each Angel you already control. {T}: Add {W}. Spend this mana only to cast an Angel spell.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2023-3 | Liliana of the Veil | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Each player discards a card. [−2]: Target player sacrifices a creature. [−6]: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of their choice.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2023-4 | Braids, Arisen Nightmare | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker. If you do, each opponent may sacrifice a permanent that shares a card type with it. For each opponent who doesn't, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2023-5 | Phyrexian Rager | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

trans-unit.resname: PWCS·2023-5 | Phyrexian Rager | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Resist if you must. It makes no difference. As with Mirrodin, your world will bow to Phyrexia."\n—Sheoldred
